name: Systemageddon
description:
Save the planets. Star system will be attacked by more and more asteroids. Don’t allow them to destroy any planet. You can click on the planets to push them. Do it to make the planets dodge the asteroids

How to play

An asteroid will destroys a planet if you won't do something 

Every asteroid's path will be displayed for you. After new asteroid's path, that aimed at a planet's orbit, appeared you need to click on the planet. After you clicked on the planet, it will be pushed and will dodge the asteroid, so the planet will be saved
